resources.string: Please enter your gender. It is important for Calorie Budget
Calorie Budget and neutrient recommendations depend on body height. You can enter the estimated height.
Calorie Budget and neutrient recommendations depend on your age. Please Enter your birthdate
Calorie Budget and neutrient recommendations depend on your weight. Please Enter your weight

string-array.item: Very heavy exercise (twice per day, extra heavy workouts)
